title: Mr. Edvvard Hydes speech at a conference betweene both Houses on Tewsday the 6th of July 1641 at the transmission of the severall impeachments against the Lord Chiefe Barron Damport, Mr. Barron Trevor, and Mr. Barron Weston.
author: Clarendon, Edward Hyde, Earl of, 1609-1674.
notes: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
